# UIContentInsetsReference

**Enumeration**

Constants that describe the reference point of the content insets.

## Declaration

```swift
enum UIContentInsetsReference
```

## Constants

- **UIContentInsetsReference.automatic**: Content insets use the system default reference point.
- **UIContentInsetsReference.none**: Content insets don’t have a reference point in relation to other insets.
- **UIContentInsetsReference.safeArea**: Content insets use a reference point in relation to the safe area.
- **UIContentInsetsReference.layoutMargins**: Content insets use a reference point in relation to the layout margins.
- **UIContentInsetsReference.readableContent**: Content insets use a reference point in relation to the readable content guide.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Configuring section spacing

- **interGroupSpacing**: The amount of space between the groups in the section.
- **contentInsets**: The amount of space between the content of the section and its boundaries.
- **contentInsetsReference**: The boundary to reference when defining content insets.
- **supplementaryContentInsetsReference**: The reference boundary for content insets on boundary supplementary items.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
